summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of V3 Scoring Engine (Impact-First v1.0). All 9 requested features tested and verified. 57/57 tests passed (38 comprehensive + 19 original).

minor.issue: Original test file had 2 tests with incorrect assertions - tests expected impact_lock when winner was already ahead on points. Fixed test logic.

critical_code_review_comments: V3 scoring engine correctly implements all 5 regularization rules
Impact lock system working correctly - KD Flash (50pt threshold), KD Hard (110pt threshold)
Event point values match config: Jab=1, Cross=3, KD Flash=100, KD Hard=150, KD NF=210
Diminishing returns properly applied: 1-10 full, 11-20 at 0.75, 21+ at 0.50
SS abuse guardrail: 1-8 full, 9-14 at 0.75, 15+ at 0.50
TD stuffed cap: first 3 full, 4+ at 0.50
10-8 scoring requires 2+ protected events OR delta >= 100
API /api/rounds/compute correctly uses v3 engine and returns red_breakdown/blue_breakdown
seed_data_creation: Created test events for bout 'test-v3-full-flow' to verify API integration
context_for_next_testing_agent: V3 scoring engine fully tested. All regularization rules and impact lock logic verified. Test files: test_v3_scoring_comprehensive.py (38 tests) and test_scoring_engine_v3.py (19 tests). API endpoint /api/rounds/compute working correctly with v3 engine.
passed_tests: TestEventPointValues: 14 tests - All event point values verified (Jab=1, Cross=3, KD Flash=100, etc)
TestImpactLockKDFlash: 2 tests - KD Flash holder wins when behind by <50, loses when behind by >=50
TestImpactLockKDHard: 2 tests - KD Hard holder wins when behind by <110, loses when behind by >=110
TestRegularizationRule1: 4 tests - Diminishing returns after 10 strikes (0.75 for 11-20, 0.50 for 21+)
TestRegularizationRule2: 3 tests - SS abuse guardrail after 8 SS strikes
TestRegularizationRule5: 2 tests - TD stuffed cap after 3
TestRoundScoring108: 3 tests - 10-8 requires 2+ protected events or delta >= 100
TestScoringBreakdown: 2 tests - red_breakdown and blue_breakdown included in response
TestAPIIntegration: 2 tests - /api/rounds/compute endpoint works with v3 engine
TestDebugOutput: 4 tests - Debug info includes technique counts, SS count, multipliers, impact lock flag

impact_lock_kd_flash.description: KD Flash holder wins unless opponent leads by >= 50 points

impact_lock_kd_hard.description: KD Hard holder wins unless opponent leads by >= 110 points

regularization_rule_1.description: Technique diminishing returns: 1-10 full, 11-20 at 0.75, 21+ at 0.50

regularization_rule_2.description: SS abuse guardrail: 1-8 full, 9-14 at 0.75, 15+ at 0.50

regularization_rule_5.description: TD stuffed cap: first 3 full, 4+ at 0.50
